testcase.name: Fedex home page title verification
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the fedex url.............................................passed Then user will get location modal...........................................passed When user clicks on english option from the location modal..................passed Then user will navigate to the fedex "HomePageTitle" home page..............passed Then verify the all services available on home page.........................passed Then verify the user navigate to the login page.............................passed And verify the login page details...........................................passed And Enter the "userName" and "password" and clicks on login button..........passed And clicks on the Forgot your user name or password link....................passed Then user clicks on the reset password CTA and navigate to other page.......passed And clicks on the Retrive user ID CTA.......................................passed Then click on the Shipping option from the login page.......................passed Then verify the "ShipWithoutaccountURL" of ship without account.............passed Then verify "Shalini" and "1188lk" fields from the ShipManager lite page....passed Then verify the "<country>" field from the ShipManager lite page...........passed
